description.narrative: Children and adolescents from selected schools and municipalities have increased knowledge on the prevention of gener-based violence and generate greater peer awareness aroung the issue, focusing on sexual violence and the prevention of adolescent pregnancy, which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children and Adolescents i the most violent municipalities have increased access to protection systems allowing them to live free from violence, abuse, exploitation, and neglect, with a particular focus on gender-based violence

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Children and families have strengthened their capacities to prevent gender-based violence in schools and promote a change in behaviors through raising awareness of children's rights, and the rejection of gender-stereotypes and the adoption of new masculine and feminine gender norms through participative methodologies based on play. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020
